Class-Swashbuckler 20 -- Male Versatile Human Swashbuckler: 20
Strength: +4 Dexterity: +4 Constitution: +3 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +4 Charisma: +4
Background: Insurgent Deity: Gozreh
Experience: 19042/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 30 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Fleet: +5 Speed
Stylish Combatant-1: +30 Speed with panache
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 5; Class: 12; General: 6 Selectable Feature Count: Human (Heritage); Swashbuckler (Style)
Feats: Additional Lore (Scouting Lore); After You; Agile Maneuvers; Antagonize; Bleeding Finisher; Brandishing Draw; Buckler Dance; Charmed Life; Cheat Death; Clever Improviser; Combination Finisher; Felicitous Riposte; Finishing Follow-Through; Flamboyant Athlete; Flamboyant Leap; Flashy Dodge; Flashy Roll; Fleet; Flying Blade; Focused Fascination; Get Used To Disappointment; Goading Feint; Guardian's Deflection; Heroic Presence; Illimitable Finisher; Impaling Finisher; Impossible Riposte; Incredible Luck; Inexhaustible Countermoves; Leading Dance; Lethal Finisher; Mobile Finisher; Multitalented; One For All; Panache Paragon; Parry And Riposte; Perfect Finisher; Plummeting Roll; Precise Finisher; Reactive Strike; Reflexive Riposte; Retreating Finisher; Revitalizing Finisher; Skill Training (Kobold Lore); Stumbling Finisher; Stunning Finisher; Supertaster; Swaggering Initiative; Switcheroo; Targeting Finisher; The Bigger They Are; Tumble Behind; Twirling Throw; Unbalancing Finisher; Unconventional Weaponry (Greataxe); Vexing Tumble; Skill Trained (Deception; Warfare Lore) Human Features: Ancestry Feats; Attribute Boost (Choose 2 from any); Human Heritage; Versatile Human
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
Battledancer: Has the Fascinating Performance feature
Clever Improviser: Has the Untrained Improvisation feature
General Feats: 5 selections
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Rascal: Has the Dirty Trick feature
Swashbuckler Feats: 11 selections
Swashbuckler's Style: 1 selection
Versatile Human: +1 General Feat
Wit: Has the Bon Mot feature
Distracting Toss: (2) Successful Feint vs. a target within 30' inflicts off-guard and allows a thrown weapon Strike
Flashy Dodge: (R) Gives +2 Armor Class vs. the triggering attack; a miss gives panache
Leading Dance: (1) Successful Performance vs. Will moves self and an adjacent foe 5' in the same direction, or 10' on a critical success; critical failure inflicts prone on self
Plummeting Roll: (R) Takes no damage from the triggering fall of at least 10' and can Stride up to 15'
Swashbuckler Expertise: Has increased Stylish Combatant effects
Targeting Finisher: (1) Successful targeted attack on a foe arm, head, or legs inflicts enfeebled 2, stupefied 2, or -10' Speed until the end of the next turn; effect extends for 1 min at half severity on a critical hit
Perception: +30 (wisdom; master)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +28 (dexterity; expert) Kobold Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Society: +24 (intelligence; untrained)
Arcana: +26 (intelligence; trained) Medicine: +24 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +24 (dexterity; untrained)
Athletics: +32 (strength; legendary) Nature: +24 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +24 (wisdom; untrained)
Crafting: +24 (intelligence; untrained) Occultism: +24 (intelligence; untrained) Thievery: +26 (dexterity; trained)
Deception: +26 (charisma; trained) Performance: +28 (charisma; expert) Warfare Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Diplomacy: +28 (charisma; expert) Religion: +24 (wisdom; untrained)
Intimidation: +30 (charisma; master) Scouting Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary)
Languages: Common; Diabolic; Fey; Petran; Sakvroth; Sussuran
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Scouting Lore): Skill Legendary (Scouting Lore)
Battledancer: Skill Trained (Performance)
Braggart: Skill Trained (Intimidation)
Fencer: Skill Trained (Deception)
Gymnast: Skill Trained (Athletics)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Perception Mastery: Perception Master
Rascal: Skill Trained (Thievery)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Kobold Lore): Skill Trained (Kobold Lore)
Swashbuckler Skills: Skill Trained (Acrobatics; Select 8 from any)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Wit: Skill Trained (Diplomacy)
Battledancer: Perform actions have the bravado trait
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures to Aid with expert skills are successes
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Fascinating Performance: Can fascinate 4 targets for 1 rd with a successful Performance vs. Will
Fencer: Create A Distraction and Feint actions have the bravado trait
Flamboyant Athlete: Panache gives 15' climb and swim Speeds, -10 jump DCs, and 5' and 15' vertical and horizontal Leaps
Focused Fascination: Fascinating Performance used with a single target fascinates on a normal success
Lengthy Diversion: Can remain hidden after a Create A Diversion attempt critically succeeds
One For All: (1) Counts as preparation to Aid an ally within 30'; the subsequent Aid can use Diplomacy and has the bravado trait
Rascal: Dirty Trick actions have the bravado trait
Stylish Combatant: +1 on bravado skills during combat
Wit: Bon Mot actions have the bravado trait
Combat
Hit Points: 268 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (3 max); master) Class DC: Swashbuckler: 40 (dexterity; master)
Armor: Chain Shirt Shield: None Weapons: Dart (+30 1d4+4 P R20'; dexterity; master); Greatsword (+30 1d12+4 S/P; strength; master); Shortbow (+30 1d6 P [Crit +d10] R60'; dexterity; master)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Eternal Confidence: Class Master (Swashbuckler)
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Light Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Light Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Multitalented: +1 Class Feat (multiclass dedication)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Swashbuckler Expertise: Class Expert (Swashbuckler)
Unconventional Weaponry (Greataxe): Weapon Familiarity (Greataxe)
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Weapon Mastery: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Weapon Proficiency (Capturing Spetum): Attack Expert (Capturing Spetum)
After You: (F) Gains panache by going taking last position in initiative
Agile Maneuvers: Reduces the multiple attack penalty for Disarm, Grapple, Reposition, Shove, and Trip to -4 and -8, or -3 and -6 for an agile weapon with panache
Antagonize: Successful Demoralize prevents lowering frightened condition below 1 until that target attacks self or moves out of sight for 1 rd
Bleeding Finisher: (1) Slashing or piercing attack also inflicts persistent bleed damage equal to precise finisher damage
Braggart: Demoralize actions have the bravado trait
Brandishing Draw: (1) Draws and Strikes with a weapon
Buckler Dance: Constantly has buckler raised
Cheat Death: (R) Retains 1 Hit Point, gains panache, and gains 1 level of doomed in response to triggering damage that would reduce self to 0 Hit Points
Combination Finisher: Reduces the multiple attack penalty for finisher Strikes to -4 and -8, or -3 and -6 for an agile weapon
Confident Finisher: (1) Failed Strike inflicts half of normal precision damage
Continuous Flair: Stylish Combatant bonus applies during exploration
Dastardly Dash: (1) Strides up to 15'; can attempt a Tripor Dirty Trick during the move
Deadly Grace: Critical hit with an agile or finesse melee weapon gains the deadly d8 trait, or inflicts double the damage dice with a deadly weapon
Derring-Do: With panache, can use the better of 2 rolls on stylish combatant actions
Disarming Flair: Disarm action has the bravado trait
Dual Finisher: (1) Makes 2 attacks against different foes at the current multiple attack penalty
Elegant Buckler: Raise A Shield gives +2 Armor Class, and a foe critical miss while a shield is raised gives panache until the end of the next turn
Enjoy The Show: Can use Perform to inflict -1 attacks against others than self until the end of the target's next turn, or -2 on a critical success; critical failure instead gives target +1 attacks against self
Eternal Confidence: Finisher Strikes with appropriate weapons gain the Confident Finisher failure effect
Even The Odds: (F) Gains panache at the beginning of the turn when flanked once per 10 min
Extravagant Parry: (1) When wielding a one-handed weapon, gives +1 Armor Class, or +2 with a free hand or a parry weapon, until the start of the next turn; a foe missing during this time gives panache util the end of the next turn
Felicitous Riposte: Opportune Riposte uses the better of two rolls
Finishing Follow-Through: Gains panache whenever a finisher brings the target to 0 HP
Flamboyant Leap: (2) Attempts a 1-action finisher during a Leap or Jump, then falls
Flying Blade: Can apply precision damage bonuses to ranged Strikes within the first range increment of thrown weapons
Get Used To Disappointment: (F) At the beginning of a turn, attempts to Demoralize a target within 30' who failed an attack or skill test vs. self
Goading Feint: Successful Feint can instead inflict -2 to next attack roll vs. self before the end of its next turn, or to all attacks vs. self on a critical success
Guardian's Deflection: (R) Gives an adjacent ally +2 Armor Class vs. the triggering hit when wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free
Gymnast: Grapple, Reposition, Shove, and Trip actions have the bravado trait
Illimitable Finisher: (1) Steps and attempts a 1-action finisher Strike as a bravado action; regaining panache allows another finisher
Impaling Finisher: (1) Makes a melee Strike against an adjacent foe and one behind it
Impossible Riposte: Can use Opportune Riposte against ranged attacks, with the subsequent Strike inflicting the same damage type as the attack
Inexhaustible Countermoves: Gains a reaction at the start of each foe turn that can be for an Opportune Riposte or Reactive Strike
Lethal Finisher: Strike inflicts 12d6 HP precision (save Fortitude inflicts 6d6 HP; critical success inflicts 6 HP; critical failure inflicts 18d6 HP)
Mobile Finisher: (1) Makes a Strike after a Stride
Opportune Riposte: (R) Strikes or attempts to Disarm for in response to the triggering critical miss
Panache Paragon: Permanently quickened; can use the extra action only to perform a bravado action
Panache: Using bravado actions, gains panache that can be use to perform some finisher actions
Parry And Riposte: While benefitting from the parry weapon Armor Class bonus or Extravagant Parry, can use Opportune Riposte after a normal failure on a foe Strike if the foe was damaged by a finisher on the prior turn
Perfect Finisher: (1) Strike uses the better of 2 rolls
Precise Finisher: Confident Finisher inflicts full precision damage on failure
Precise Strike: Agile and finesse attack inflicts +6 HP precision, or +6d6 HP precision for finisher Strikes
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Reflexive Riposte: Can use an additional reaction for Opportune Riposte each turn
Retreating Finisher: (1) Strike allows a Step as a free action on failure
Revitalizing Finisher: (1) Strike gives self an allies within 30' 10 temporary Hit Points; failure gives these only to self
Stumbling Finisher: (1) Strike pushes the target 5', or 10' on a critical hit
Stunning Finisher: (1) Successful Strike inflicts stunned 1 (save Fortitude prevents target reactions until its next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stunned 3)
Swaggering Initiative: (F) +2 initiative and allows drawing a weapon; acting first in combat gives panache
Switcheroo: (R) With panache, can Reposition an adjacent foe to suffer the triggering ranged attack with lesser cover, or with no cover on a critical success; critical failure inflicts off-guard on self against the attack, and any result other than critical success causes loss of panache
The Bigger They Are: (1) Successful Tumble Through a larger creature's space inflicts weakness 10 against to precision damage from next self attack until the end of the next turn, or against all self self attacks on a critical success; critical failure inflicts prone on self
Tumble Behind: Successful Tumble Through inflicts off-guard against the next self attack until the end of the turn
Twirling Throw: (1) Thrown weapon attack ignores 2nd and 3rd range increment penalties; weapon returns except on a critical failure
Unbalancing Finisher: (1) Successful Strike inflicts off-guard until the end of the target's next turn
Vexing Tumble: (1) Successful Acrobatics vs. Reflex while Striding up to 15' does not trigger reactions; critical success also inflicts off-guard on foes until the end of the turn, and critical failure ends move when within a foe's reach
Vivacious Bravado: (1) Gaining panache gives 24 temporary Hit Points until the start of the next turn
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, or +8 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
You're Next: (R) After downing a foe, makes a +2 Intimidation check to Demoralize another within 60'
Save: Fortitude: +27 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +32 (dexterity; legendary); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Assured Evasion: Save Legendary (Reflex)
Confident Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Fortitude Expertise: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Reinforced Ego: Save Master (Will)
Assured Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes, critical Reflex failures are normal failures, and failed Reflex saves inflict half damage
Charmed Life: (R) +2 on the triggering save, and success gives panache until the end of the next turn
Confident Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Flashy Roll: Flashy Dodge can also be used with Reflex saves; critically failure on the attack or critical success on the save allows a 10' Stride
Incredible Luck: Charmed life uses the better of two rolls
Reinforced Ego: Successes on Will save are critical successes
Magic
Magic Notes: Heroic Presence: (1) R30' Generates the effects of a 6th-rank Zealous Conviction on 10 willing creatures once per day
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 12 available vs. 60 allocated
Swashbuckler Style Allocation: 1 available vs. 6 allocated
